webResources.textAttributionSnippet:
(en) A postcard with two people installed in a collective photo. The younger girl stands and is dressed in light accessories as well as a hat, the older maid sits on a chair and is dressed in high heels, sailor’s hat, bathrobe, black tights and a striped shirt. In question, perhaps, the actors of the play?
“Sea Captain Jeremias Pätkänen and his daughter Heta. 20.”(original text) - https://www.europeana.eu/item/2021008/_knp_120692. Lusto - The Finnish Forest Museum - http://finna.fi/Record/lusto.knp-120692. CC BY - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
